content:
The extension for patient gender identity is listed in the Patient resource but not in the extensibility registry. Is that OK?
"http://build.fhir.org/extension-patient-genderidentity.html"
That seems like a publishing bug. @Grahame Grieve @Mark Iantorno
probably a consequence of the rework of R5 code. I'll look when I get a chance
fixed next release of the core build tool
